overview: Officer Karl Bruno is going deep undercover to bust a prostitution ring fronting as a massge parlor. His rugged masculine good looks make it easy for him to pose as a masseur looking for work. When he shows up for his interview with parlor boss Ace Harden, the police officer gets an eyeful of what really goes on "under covers!" Starring Tony Piagi, Josh Sterling, Bryan Kidd, Drew Andrews, Nick Roberts and Dino DiMarco.
title: Under Covers
